Name: Baikonur Cosmodrome
World achievements: The first satellite, Sputnik 1, was launched.

Name: Ohsumi
World achievements: The smallest satellite launch vehicle (L-4S; 9.4t weight, 1.4m diameter)

Name: Leaving Earth orbit
Asian First: The first interplanetary launch by solid rocket (M-3SII)

Name: First man in space launched by an Asian space program
Soft-landed probe on extraterrestrial object
Asian First: The first asteroid ascent, sample return from an asteroid

Name: ASAT test
Asian First: Highest in history with altitude 865 km, also the fastest with speed 18k miles

Name: Manned foundations in space (STS-123, STS-124, STS-127)
Asian First: The world’s largest pressurized volume in space[57]

Name: Indigenous Tracking & Data Relay Satellite System First TDRS system to support manned missions
Probe designed for Lunar impact
Asian First: Discovered water on the Moon before impact.[58][59]

Name: Solar sail
Asian First: The first spacecraft to successfully demonstrate solar-sail technology in interplanetary space

Name: Lunar probe with extended deep space missions (asteroid mission to 4179 Toutatis).
First manned space docking by an Asian country (with Tiangong-1)
First lunar soft landing and lunar rover by an Asian country.
First successful Mars mission by an Asian country
Asian First: First Martian mission by a country to succeed on the first attempt. Third country to do so after the USSR and the USA.
